channel.title: Connection problems
channel.description:
After portforwarding, I can connect to the server. However, other people cannot. So, I'm wanting some help from you guys.
The client I'm using, if it matters, is the AGS Pking client, with modifications. The IP I used to portforward was my default gateway from typing "ipconfig" in the CMD.
Help is appreciated.

item.title: Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

After portforwarding, I can connect to the server. However, other people cannot. So, I’m wanting some help from you guys.

The client I’m using, if it matters, is the AGS Pking client, with modifications. The IP I used to portforward was my default gateway from typing “ipconfig” in the CMD.

Help is appreciated.

Read full topic
